articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A test-fire of the inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-15 was successfully conducted on November 29 under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 Kim Jong Un personally supervised the whole course of the test-fire.
					
					 He indicated the orientation of developing a new type rocket that can make the final victory of the country in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists and gave detailed instructions every day to the Academy of Defence Science for doing so and thus made sure that the Hwasong-15 weapon system was successfully completed.
					
					 Upon receiving the report that it is ready to test-fire the new type ICBM on Nov. 28, he came out to the place where technical preparations for the rocket was under way late at night to see the 9-axis self-propelled launching vehicle manufactured by workers of the munitions industry.
					
					 He praised them for having successfully made the vehicle to be impeccable.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that such vehicles can be manufactured as many as the country wants now that the munitions industry has made a breakthrough in putting the production of all parts of the vehicle on a domestic and Juche basis 100 percent.
					
					 He went to the launching ground and meticulously guided the pre-launch processes one by one including the one for vertically standing the rocket.
					
					 At an observation post for command he learned in detail about the launching plan and issued an order to launch the rocket.
					
					 The rocket successfully blasted off and soared into the sky.
					
					 The ICBM Hwasong-15 soared to the highest altitude of 4,475 km and made a flight over the distance of 950 km for 53 minutes before making an accurate landing in the preset waters in the open sea in the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 The test-fire confirmed that all the integers of the weapon system have satisfactorily complied with the requirements of design and that it is capable of fully ensuring reliability in combat situation to serve its mission as strategic weaponry system.
					
					 Particularly, the accuracy of hitting targets by posture control and speed correction in the mid-flight section, accuracy in operation of high-thrust engine to which propulsion vector control is applied and the engine of high specific thrust was confirmed, and the accuracy of design integers of subsequent guided and stabilization systems was verified.
					
					 Also confirmed were mobile and hoisting capabilities and operational reliability of launching system of the nine-axis self-propelled launching vehicle newly developed and completed.
					
					 The test-fire also re-confirmed the control and stabilization technology, phase-separation and start-up technology and the safety of warhead in the atmospheric reentry environment that had already been confirmed.
					
					 The ICBM Hwasong-15 weapon system represents the weapon system peculiar to the Workers' Party of Korea, which was developed with domestic efforts and technology 100 percent to suit the specific conditions of the country. With this system, the DPRK has become possessed of another new-type inter-continental ballistic rocket weaponry system capable of carrying super-heavy nuclear warhead and attacking the whole mainland of the U.S.
					
					 Greatly satisfied with the at-a-go success in the test-fire of the newly developed ICBM Hwasong-15, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was so excited to express his great satisfaction and extend his heartfelt gratitude to all those who took part in the development of the new type rocket weapon system.
					
					 He said that the day was a significant day when the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power was realized, adding that the day, on which the great might of putting the strategic position of the DPRK on a higher stage was given birth, should be specially recorded in the history of the country.
					
					 The dazzling achievements made in all fields of the country recently including the field of national defence science are a great victory which can be won only by the heroic people of the DPRK who remain true to the cause of our Party without vacillation, weathering all tempests of history.
					
					 He warmly congratulated scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of the defence science who demonstrated once again the dignity and might of Juche Korea by succeeding in the test-fire of the newly-developed ICBM Hwasong-15, and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Chang Ha, Jon Il Ho, Jo Yong Won and Yu Jin.

articles.title: DPRK Gov't Statement on Successful Test-fire of New-Type ICBM
articles.content:
DPRK Gov't Statement on Successful Test-fire of New-Type ICBM
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea announced the following statement Wednesday over the successful test-fire of new-type ICBM:
					 The test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-15, newly developed under the political resolution and strategic decision of the Workers' Party of Korea, was successfully carried out.
					
					 The ICBM Hwasong-15 type weaponry system is an intercontinental ballistic rocket tipped with super-large heavy warhead which is capable of striking the whole mainland of the U.S. This system has much greater advantages in its tactical and technological specifications and technical characteristics than Hwasong-14 whose test-fire was conducted in July last, and it is the most powerful ICBM which meets the goal of the completion of the rocket weaponry system development set by the DPRK.
					
					 Upon authorization of the WPK and the government of the DPRK, ICBM Hwasong-15 was launched at 02:48 on Nov. 29, Juche 106 (2017) in the suburbs of Pyongyang under the guidance of Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 After making a 53-minute flight along its preset orbit, the rocket accurately landed in the target waters set in the open sea in the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 The test-fire was conducted in the highest angle launch system and it had no adverse effect on the security of neighboring countries.
					
					The rocket soared to the highest altitude of 4,475 km and then flew the distance of 950 km.
					
					 After watching the successful launch of the new type ICBM Hwasong-15, Kim Jong Un declared with pride that now we have finally realized the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power.
					
					 The great success in the test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 is a priceless victory won by the great and heroic people of the DPRK who have upheld the WPK's line on the simultaneous development of the two fronts with loyalty without the slightest vacillation despite the vicious challenges by the U.S. imperialists and their followers and manifold difficulties.
					
					 The development and advancement of the strategic weapon of the DPRK are to defend the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country from the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail policy and nuclear threat, and to ensure the peaceful life of the people, and therefore, they would not pose any threat to any country and region as long as the interests of the DPRK are not infringed upon. This is our solemn declaration.
					
					 As a responsible nuclear power and a peace-loving state, the DPRK will make every possible effort to serve the noble purpose of defending peace and stability of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Order to Test-fire New ICBM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Order to Test-fire New ICBM
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of our Party, state and army, gave an autographic order to test-fire the newly developed inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-15 on Nov. 28, Juche 106 (2017).

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Palestine President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Palestine President
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on the occasion of the Day of World's Solidarity with the Palestine People.
					 Kim in the message stressed that it is the invariable stand of the DPRK to extend full support and solidarity to the Palestine people in their just struggle for founding an independent state with eastern Kuds as its capital and regaining their legitimate national rights.
					
					 Vehemently denouncing the Zionists for expanding the Jewish settlements illegally in the Palestine territory and resorting to racist suppression and killings, the message extended full support to the president and people of Palestine in their struggle for peacefully settling the Mideast issues and taking the national sovereignty.

articles.title: Premier Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Premier Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Premier of the Cabinet Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					 He encouraged the workers of the complex in a dynamic general offensive for the victory of socialism, going round different parts of it.
					
					 A consultative meeting was convened on the spot to discuss the measures for perfecting the production process at the complex and hitting its high goal of Juche iron production with its own efforts, and domestic technology and resources.
					
					 Earlier, the premier inspected the Pyongyang Lift Factory and the Pyongyang Construction Machinery Factory, stressing the need to produce more modern construction equipment.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Feted
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Wednesday hosted a reception in honor of the visiting joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, and Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made.

articles.title: Lao Embassy Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Lao Embassy Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Lao embassy here hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Wednesday to mark the 42nd anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Experience Sharing Meeting of Workers in Fruit-farming Field
articles.content:
Experience Sharing Meeting of Workers in Fruit-farming Field
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- There took place a national experience-sharing meeting of workers in fruit-farming at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 It was attended by the participants of the national meeting of activists in the field of fruit-farming.
					
					 Speakers there referred to the successes and experience gained in the course of putting the fruit-farming on a scientific, intensive and modern basis.
					
					 That day they looked round the venue of the exhibition of achievements made in fruit-farming.

articles.title: Pakistani Embassy Officials Visit War Museum
articles.content:
Pakistani Embassy Officials Visit War Museum
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Pakistani embassy here visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the 45th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Islamic Republic of Pakistan.
					 They went round several halls of the museum, being briefed on the brilliant myth of war victory created thanks to the outstanding military idea, Juche war method, strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and patriotism and fighting spirit of the Korean army and people.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Central Zoo, the Natural History Museum, etc.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Hail Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Hail Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the statement of the DPRK government on the successful test-fire of new-type ICBM Hwasong-15 on Wednesday, the whole country is seized with great joy.
					 Kim Song Hyok, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 The successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 is a proud victory brought about by the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 It is a great auspicious event that demonstrated the inexhaustible might of Juche Korea and dealt a telling blow to the U.S.
					
					 Every Juche weapon we developed despite of vicious challenge and sanction of the U.S. imperialists is a treasured sword of justice for defending the country and the people and mercilessly destroying the invaders.
					
					 Today's event, which declared the accomplishment of the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power, will abide long in the history of building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Ko Sung Il, a KPA officer, said that the successful test-fire of new-type ICBM is another signal victory won by the DPRK in the confrontation with the U.S., adding: 
					
					 I seem to see old lunatic Trump and those riff-raffs making a great fuss, daunted by our new "gift package".
					
					 There is a saying "Sow the wind and reap the whirlwind".
					
					 The more desperate the old lunatic remains in such provocations as re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism", the stronger self-defensive countermeasure of the DPRK they will meet.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that no force on earth can check the advance of the DPRK and the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will show no mercy to the invaders.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens Rejoiced at Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens Rejoiced at Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The successful test-fire of new-type ICBM Hwasong-15, which was carried out under the political resolution and strategic decision of the Workers' Party of Korea, all the people across the DPRK are filled with great joy and excitement.
					 In this regard, Yang Ho, vice-minister of the Metallurgical Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 I am very excited after hearing the news about the successful test-fire.
					
					 It will be a great thunderclap to the U.S. and hostile forces which are running amuck to block the advance of the DPRK. And it is a great victory that declares all over the world the DPRK would firmly defend its dignity and sovereignty with its strong nuclear deterrent.
					
					 I will do my best to make fresh achievements in putting the metal industry on a Juche and modern basis with the spirit displayed by the defense scientists and technicians.
					
					 Hong Pyong Guk, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences, said:
					
					 The ICBM Hwasong-15 is a perfect and powerful rocket capable of striking the whole U.S. mainland with super-large heavy nuclear warhead tipped. And it is a weaponry system with high maneuverability and accuracy, which was developed by our own efforts and technology. I want to express my heartfelt thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for accomplishing the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 The new ICBM is a pride representing our dignity, spirit and future.
					
					 The victorious test-fire of ICBM pronounces that it is time for the U.S. and its vassal forces to make a proper option.
					
					 With no atrocious sanction, the enemies can check the DPRK people who are advancing toward the final victory in socialism with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader.
					
					 We, scientists of Juche Korea, will uphold the respected Supreme Leader with more scientific achievements of loyalty.

articles.title: Great Feats Performed by KPA Air Force
articles.content:
Great Feats Performed by KPA Air Force
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- It has been 72 years after the foundation of the Juche-oriented air force which has reliably safeguarded the territorial air of the DPRK in the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the country.
					 After the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung penetrated deep into the significance and importance of the air force and declared the birth of the Juche-oriented air force through the publication of the historic speech "Let Us Create the Air Force of the New Korea" he made on November 29, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 Since then, the air force of the DPRK has performed great feats in the grim annals of the Korean revolution.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), the U.S. imperialists hurled one fifth of its air force, boasting of its "air supremacy", but could not escape shameless defeat.
					
					 Only in a week of July 1950, the DPRK air force shot down 13 U.S. warplanes, including "B-29" and damaged over 10 warplanes.
					
					 At dawn of January 1, 1952, they destroyed more than 20 warplanes and lots of combat equipment through a surprise bombing attack on the Kimpho airfield.
					
					 In June 1952, a plane of the DPRK air force shot down or dispersed more than 20 enemy warplanes in the sky over Sinuiju, thus defending the President on a tour of inspection.
					
					 After the war, the DPRK air force has dealt telling blows to the U.S. imperialists whenever they invade the territorial sky of the DPRK.
					
					 It is well evidenced by the incidents of "F-80" shot down in January 1954, "EC-121" downed in April 1969 and "RC-135" driven back in March 2003 and others.
					
					 In the new century of Juche, the DPRK air force has enjoyed its heyday, demonstrating its invincible might under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In this period, it has produced 14 human bombs, possessed of a-match-for-a-hundred heroic spirit and self-sacrificing and self-blasting spirit, and a number of service personnel decorated for their meritorious service.
					
					 And dozens of air units and subunits were named after the heroes, including Kim Hwa Ryong, Kang Sung Hyon and Ri Ki Bong, who dedicated their life to defending the leader and performed great feats during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The title of Hero of the Republic was awarded to fighter 009 for playing a great role in different battles during the war and fighter 415 for shooting down "EC-121" and to other warplanes.
					
					 Indeed, the great feats performed by the DPRK airmen are a historic miracle which could be worked only by the air force of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: New System for Detecting Fisheries Developed
articles.content:
New System for Detecting Fisheries Developed
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Fishery under the Ministry of Fisheries developed a new aid system for detecting fisheries, which would be conducive to putting fishing on a higher scientific basis.
					 On the basis of scientific analysis of existing detection methods, a research group of the institute directed the research at raising the scientific accuracy of fishery estimation by attaching additional data on seawater temperature below surface, salinity and seawater level to marine environmental information which had been limited to surface seawater temperature.
					
					 The group also updated the process of analyzing marine environmental information and settled technological problems arising in writing a program to estimate the temperature of seawater layers and sea currents with higher accuracy.
					
					 Meanwhile, it upgraded a program for positioning and tracking fishing boats.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slashes at U.S. Increase of Military Budget
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slashes at U.S. Increase of Military Budget
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. House of Representatives passed the "2018 bill on amendments to the National Defense Authorization Act", which increased the next year's defense budget to 700 billion US dollars.
					 According to the U.S. act on budget control instituted in 2011, the annual defense budget should be limited to below 600 billion US dollars. However, the Trump administration already increased the defense budget by 54 billion US dollars in March this year and is about to increase it dramatically next year.
					
					 What should never be overlooked is that the U.S. put up "nuclear and missile threats from north Korea" as a pretext for the sharp increase of its military spending.
					
					 The U.S. Lower House increased the budget for the Missile Defense Agency under the Department of Defense to 12.3 billion US dollars under the excuse of "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK. It decided to allot a fabulous amount of money for deploying the missile interception system targeting the DPRK and beefing up the U.S. forces in Asia-Pacific, as evidenced by its deployment of 28 GBI ground-based interceptor missiles in Alaska and nuclear-capable strategic bombers near the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Such crazy act of the U.S. as spending astronomical funds for its military in peacetime, not in wartime, in a bid to dominate the world with absolute military edge is greatly concerning and stunning the public.
					
					 The U.S. has clearly revealed its true intention of hyping "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK through the above-said "bill".
					
					 It is just a revelation of its brigandish design to dominate the world by force and occupy at any cost the countries failing to kowtow to it by military threats and aggression as it is aimed to invent a pretext for increasing military expenditure to invade the DPRK and realize the strategy for putting the whole world under control.
					
					 This is clearly proven by the racket of military threats being escalated by the Trump administration, its development of new type nukes and modernization of war hardware.
					
					 Asserting the security of the U.S. mainland can be ensured only when its missile defense system is deployed on earth orbits, the U.S. even talks about the resumption of the "star wars" project.
					
					 It even raised the "conception of comprehensive and immediate strike" and is crying out for testing its main components in Korea soon.
					
					 According to reports of foreign media, Trump recently asked the Congress to increase the military spending by 5.9 billion US dollars and is going to use 4 billion US dollars for the deployment of missile defense and reconnaissance systems on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S, despite its almost empty national coffer and national debt amounting to 20 trillion US dollars, is resorting to such reckless increase of military expenditure. It is, indeed, a belligerent country of military gangsters and a cancer-like one against mankind.
					
					 History proved that the increase of U.S. military spending resulted in adding fuel to the arms race among big powers, harassing global peace and security and increasing the danger of a nuclear war in the Korean peninsula and the region, in particular.
					
					 The progressive mankind opposing war and loving peace should further intensify the struggle against U.S. imperialism, the war monster, seeing through its aggressive nature.

articles.title: 27th Anniversary of Pomminryon Marked in S. Korea
articles.content:
27th Anniversary of Pomminryon Marked in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting marking the 27th anniversary of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) took place in Seoul on Nov. 26, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Attending it were representatives of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and political parties and organizations including the People's Party and the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions.
					
					 Ri Kyu Jae, chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, in a speech, called upon the people in the north and the south of Korea and overseas to launch more vigorously the anti-U.S. struggle for independence and peace under the uplifted banner of tripartite solidarity.
					
					 He underscored the need to hold a meeting of co-chairmen of Pomminryon in which delegates from the north and the south and overseas can meet in person.
					
					 Then followed solidarity speeches.
					
					 Solidarity messages from the north and overseas headquarters of Pomminryon were read out and a video titled "From candlelight of democratic resistance to candlelight of anti-U.S. resistance" shown at the meeting.
					
					 The permanent representative of the People's Party stressed in a speech that everyone should turn out in the grand march for national independence and reunification to make a new history of the nation.
					
					 Then a resolution was read out.
					
					 The resolution said that they would convene a meeting for tripartite solidarity on the occasion of Aug. 15 next year and set it as major fighting goals to carry out such political tasks for the national independence and great national unity, the conclusion of a peace treaty, the withdrawal of U.S. troops, the abrogation of "Security Law" and the reunification by federal formula and implement the June 15 and October 4 declarations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Germany
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Berlin, Germany on Nov. 20.
					 Michael Cott, chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 20 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, seminar, photo exhibition and film show in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Dar es Salaam on Nov. 18.
					 Maina, vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups and secretary general of the Tanzania-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 18 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk to Be Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk to Be Marked in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the centenary of birth of mother Kim Jong Suk was formed in Basel on Nov. 18.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Nov. 26 to Dec. 24 and decided to give wide publicity to the exploits of Kim Jong Suk and hold diverse political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Ethiopian Juche Idea Study Group Formed
articles.content:
Ethiopian Juche Idea Study Group Formed
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Juche Idea Study Group came to being on Nov. 8.
					 Abdi Kedir, president of the Confederation of Taekwondo of Ethiopia, was elected chief of the group.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige el lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-15"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige el lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-15"
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Bajo la direccion personal de Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 29 con exito el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-15".
					El Maximo Dirigente dirigio en el terreno todo el curso de lanzamiento.
					
					El habia indicado a la Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional la direccion de desarrollo del cohete de nuevo tipo que pueda determinar la victoria segura en la confrontacion con el imperialismo norteamericano y completo el sistema de armamento del tipo "Hwasong-15" dando instrucciones detalladas casi todos los dias.
					
					Informado el dia 28 de la conclusion de los preparativos de disparo experimental del nuevo ICBM, llego a medianoche al taller de preparacion tecnica del cohete y miro el camion de 9 ejes con plataforma de lanzamiento autopropulsada.
					
					Evaluando de perfecto el vehiculo, reconocio los ingentes esfuerzos de los obreros de la fabrica participantes en la fabricacion del mismo.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho apuntando que ahora se hizo posible producir los camiones en cantidades deseadas, ya que el sector de industria belica abrio el arremetedero en producir todos los componentes de la plataforma de lanzamiento usando en 100% los recursos nacionales y tecnologias propias.
					
					El salio al campo de lanzamiento y dirigio detalle por detalle todos los procesos previos al lanzamiento como el levantamiento vertical de ICBM.
					
					Seguidamente, ocupo el puesto de mando y observacion donde dio la orden de iniciar el lanzamiento luego de cerciorarse del plan correspondiente. 
					
					El "Hwasong-15" se ha despegado hacia el extenso universo estrenando su cuerpo voluminoso entre destellos.
					
					El cohete alcanzo la maxima altura vertical de 4475km y cayo exactamente en la zona maritima prefijada en alta mar del Mar Este de Corea al cabo de navegar una distancia de 950km durante 53 minutos.
					
					Con el lanzamiento exitoso, se confirmo que todos los valores del sistema de armamento satisficieron exactamente los requerimientos del diseno y se podra garantizar su plena confiabilidad en el ambiente de combate acorde a su mision de medio estrategico.
					
					En particular, quedaron comprobadas la punteria segun el control de posicion y el ajuste de velocidad en el tramo intermedio de vuelo, la exactitud de funcionamiento del motor de gran capacidad controlable con vector de propulsion y del motor de alta propulsion especifica y la certeza de los correspondientes valores del diseno de induccion y estabilizacion.
					
					Y se han verificado la capacidad de traslado y levantamiento del nuevo camion de 9 ejes con plataforma de lanzamiento autopropulsada y la confiabilidad de funcionamiento del sistema de disparo.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, se ha confirmado una vez mas la confiabilidad de la tecnologia de control y estabilizacion, la de separacion por etapas y arranque y la ojiva en el ambiente de reentrada.
					
					El sistema de armamento del ICBM "Hwasong-15" es el del estilo del PTC, desarrollado en 100% con las fuerzas y tecnicas domesticas conforme a las realidades coreanas. 
					
					Asi, la RPDC pudo contar con otro sistema coheteril de nuevo tipo que puede cargar ojivas nucleares superpesadas y golpear todo el territorio principal de EE.UU.
					
					Muy contento del exito de "Hwasong-15" en el primer intento, el Maximo Dirigente dijo que agradece a todos los combatientes participantes en el desarrollo del nuevo ICBM.
					
					Prosiguio que hoy es el dia significativo en que se cumplieron la historica causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y la empresa de convertir el pais en una potencia coheteril. 
					
					Hay que registrar con letras mayusculas en los anales de la patria este dia de nacimiento de la gran fuerza que ha elevado la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, indico.
					
					Los relevantes exitos, que se logran ultimamente en todos los sectores del pais incluyendo la rama de ciencias de defensa nacional, constituyen la gran victoria que puede alcanzar solo el heroico pueblo coreano que viene apoyando con fidelidad la causa del Partido sin vacilacion alguna ante cualesquier vientos y mareas de la historia, expreso.
					
					Tomo la foto de recuerdo con los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios de esa rama felicitando calidamente a ellos que volvieron a demostrar a todo el mundo el aspecto digno y gallardo de la Corea del Juche al realizar con exito el lanzamiento de prueba del nuevo cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-15".
					
					El Maximo Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Jang Chang Ha, Jon Il Ho, Jo Yong Won y Yu Jin.

articles.title: Gobierno de la RPDC declara el exitoso lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
articles.content:
Gobierno de la RPDC declara el exitoso lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental de nuevo tipo, el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 29 la siguiente declaracion:
					Segun la decision politica y estrategica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se realizo con exito el lanzamiento de prueba del recien desarrollado cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-15".
					
					  El sistema de armamento del ICBM "Hwasong-15" puede cargar las ojivas nucleares superpesadas y golpear todo el territorio principal de EE.UU. Sus indices tacticos y tecnicos y especificaciones tecnicas son mucho mas ventajosos que el "Hwasong-14" cuyo lanzamiento de prueba tuvo lugar en julio pasado.
					
					  Asi es el cohete balistico intercontinental mas poderoso que llega a la etapa de acabado en el desarrollo del sistema coheteril que nos hemos propuesto.
					
					Por el encargo del PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC, el lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15" se realizo bajo la direccion personal del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					El cohete lanzado en el suburbio de la capital Pyongyang a las 2 y 48 del 29 de noviembre del 106 (2017) de la Era Juche navego 53 minutos por la orbita de vuelo predeterminada y cayo con exactitud en la zona maritima prefijada en alta mar del Mar Este de Corea.
					
					El disparo experimental se realizo a manera de aumentar al maximo la altura del cohete y no dio ningun impacto negativo en la seguridad de los Estados circunvecinos. 
					
					El ICBM alcanzo la maxima altura vertical de 4,475km y navego una distancia de 950km.
					
					Observando el exitoso lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15", el Maximo Dirigente declaro en tono orgulloso que en el dia de hoy, se cumplieron por fin la historica causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y la empresa de convertir el pais en una potencia coheteril.
					
					El pleno exito del lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15" es una victoria muy costosa lograda por el gran y heroico pueblo coreano quien ha venido sosteniendo con fidelidad la linea de desarrollo paralelo de nuestro partido sin vacilacion alguna ante las multiples pruebas y los brutales desafios del imperialismo norteamericano y sus satelites.
					
					La fabricacion y el desarrollo de armas estrategicas de la RPDC son en absoluto para defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais y la vida pacifica del pueblo desde la politica de chantaje nuclear y la amenaza nuclear del imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					Volvemos a declarar con solemnidad que esos medios no constituiran amenaza para ningun pais o region mientras estos no perjudiquen los intereses de nuestro Estado.
					
					Como potencia nuclear responsable y Estado amante de la paz, la RPDC realizara todos los esfuerzos a su alcance por cumplir su noble objetivo de defender la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un da orden de lanzamiento del ICBM de nuevo tipo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un da orden de lanzamiento del ICBM de nuevo tipo
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, dio el 28 de noviembre del 106 (2017) de la Era Juche la orden firmada de puno y letra sobre la ejecucion del lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-15", nuevamente desarrollado.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y premier del Consejo de Ministros, averiguo en el terreno la situacion del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae.
					En su recorrido por varios puntos, el estimulo a los obreros quienes libran la ofensiva general hacia la victoria del socialismo.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno se discutieron los remedios para perfeccionar los procesos de produccion ya acondicionados y alcanzar la alta meta de produccion del hierro Juche basandose en las fuerzas, tecnicas y recursos nacionales.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier coreano paso revista a la Fabrica de Ascensores de Pyongyang y la Fabrica de Maquinas de Construccion de Pyongyang donde instruyo producir muchos equipos modernos para suministrarlos a los campos de construccion del socialismo.

articles.title: CC del PTC ofrece banquete en honor de la delegacion rusa
articles.content:
CC del PTC ofrece banquete en honor de la delegacion rusa
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecio el dia 29 un banquete en honor de la delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de la Duma Estatal de Rusia.
					En la ocasion fueron invitados los miembros de la delegacion rusa encabezada por Kazbek Taysaev, secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa y jefe del grupo parlamentario de amistad Rusia-Corea de la Duma Estatal y el embajador ruso en Corea, Alexandr Matsegora.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Chol, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					En la recepcion hubo discursos.

articles.title: Presentacion nacional de experiencias de rama fruticola
articles.content:
Presentacion nacional de experiencias de rama fruticola 
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la presentacion nacional de experiencias de la rama fruticola.
					  En la ocasion participaron los participantes en la reunion nacional de activistas de la rama fruticola.
					
					  En la presentacion hubo intervenciones
					
					  Los intervencionistas se refirieron a los exitos y experiencias logrados al acelerar la cientifizacion, la intensificacion y la modernizacion de la produccion fruticola.
					
					  Explicaron con los datos cientifico-tecnicos las recien creadas y aplicadas variedades de frutas con alta productividad y buen sabor y las peculiaridades del patron de manzanos bajos con fuerte resistencia al frio.
					
					  Atrajeron la atencion de los participantes las experiencias del distrito de Kwail que incremento la cantidad de produccion de manzanas en mas de 50 toneladas por una hectarea al realizar de manera cientifica y tecnica la cuida de manzanos bajos.
					
					  Ademas, gozaron de buena reputacion las experiencias de la Granja Combinada Fruticola Taedonggang que elevo el nivel de informatizacion de la fruticultura y el porcentaje de mecanizacion al establecer el sistema de mando del cultivo fruticola segun el mapa electronico e inventar y fabricar decenas de maquinas desyerbadoras de engranajes.
					
					  El mismo dia los participantes recorrieron la exposicion nacional de exitos de la rama fruticola.
